title: S5 Ep31: Closing the European data gap
itunes:title: Closing the European data gap
description: Recorded live at CEPR Paris Symposium 2022: Researchers and policymakers need data, but in Europe they often cannot access the right data at the right time. Filippo di Mauro and Ugo Panizza invite Tim Phillips for coffee to explain how these problems hold back research and decision-making â€“ and suggest what can be done to close the economic data gap.
